Description: Funerary papyrus of Tameni; frame 3; full colour vignettes including reliquary of Thinis, weighing of the heart, and Geb and Nut; cursive Hieroglyphic text.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (242)
Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 106)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (133519) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/133519)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached Black ink Pigment (abraded) Backed: linen Edged: brown paper Displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Refused for loan to Slovenia 2007 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: C Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: D Curatorial condition comment: good
